Subject: Neo Beast Wars

Wildfire:







Wildfire left Stingtra go her own way, since she wasn't going to 
struggle with convising her that she belonged to where she was going. 
She thought that she was injured during that battle. And it was 
obvious with the damage she had. 

She walked the edge of the forest, heading back to the Predacon cave. 
Against the quiet of the ambient, she heard a wolf howl. It was a 
deep-voiced wolf, and possible very large. It was at a distance, but 
she sensed something different from it. It revealed to her that it 
was not just an ordanary wolf. It was a wolf-bot, like the she-wolf 
back at base. 

This wolf, she could tell was not the Predacon she-wolf, but the 
missing Rowdy Wolf. She felt the danger from him, and the sorrow. 

~No,~ she said to herself and bolted as fast as she could to the 
Predacon cave. At the entrace of it, she called: ~He's here! He's out 
there!~ She sent that image of Rowdy Wolf from the source of little 
Quickstrike's mind, and shaped it differently, as a darker figure, 
and a more colder face.
